details.title: Never miss a moment again.
details.text:
Experience thrilling sporting moments with Sky Sports Mobile TV - Pack 1.
  • Enjoy Pack 1 of Sky Sports Mobile TV, including Sky Sports 1 & 2.
  • Available only on iPhones and selected Android phones.
  • Get your 3 months free by clicking "Get Sky Sports Mobile TV pack 1"

checkbox.label: Vodafone terms and conditions
checkbox.errorMessage: Please check the Vodafone terms and conditions box to continue

accordion.label: Sky Sports Mobile TV
accordion.text:
Subscription
Get unlimited access to Sky Sports 1 & 2 with Pack 1
Data charges
For data charges whilst roaming and for data charges outside of your allowance, standard data charges apply to your plan. Usage will be taken from your data allowance.
Stopping the subscription
You will be charged 5.99 a month and you can cancel anytime.
Supported devices and limitations
Sky Sports TV is only supported on Android and iPhones. In order to activate the subscription with Vodafone for the first time, the device must be connected to the mobile network using the SIM card linked to this subscription. Please ensure WiFi is switched off on your handset during activation.

okButton.label: Get Sky Sports Mobile TV pack 1

success.title: What happens next?
success.text:
Congratulations, you’re now ready to get your Sky sports Mobile TV app and start watching some great Sport
Download the Sky Sports Mobile TV app from the app store, open the app, select ‘I subscribe to Mobile TV with Vodafone’ and follow the instructions to start watching live sport on the go.
Please note, you need to be on the Vodafone network for the first time you access the app. Remember to switch off the WiFi
Sky Sports Mobile TV pack 2
Experience thrilling sporting moments with Sky sports Mobile TV
  • Enjoy Sky sports Mobile TV pack 2, including all the extra Sky Sports channels for only €12.99 per month.
  • Enjoy pack 2 of Sky Sports Mobile TV, including all the extra Sky Sports channels
  • Pack even more sports into your life and never miss live coverage of your favourite sports.
  • Available only on iPhones and selected Android phones.  
For just €12.99 per month
I accept terms and conditions.
Subscription
You get unlimited access to Sky Sports Mobile TV pack 2 including Sky Sports 3, 4, F1 and Sky Sports News
Internet charges
You pay standard internet charges while roaming or if your have exceeded your monthly allowance
Stopping the subscription
You will be charged €12.99 a month and can cancel at any time by going to https://offers.vodafone.com/ie/cancel
Supported phones
Sky Sports Mobile TV is only available on iPhone and selected Android phone

In order to activate your subscription through the Sky Sports Mobile TV app, your smartphone must be connected to the mobile network using you Vodafone sim linked to this subscription.

customButton.description: You might be interested in this additional offer.
customButton.label: Get Sky Sports Mobile Pack 2

getAppButton.label: Get Sky Sports Mobile TV app
